# Accessing the Connections Add-in from the Outlook web client {#addingoutlookemailstofiles .task}

The Connections Add-in features are available as submenu on the email message More Actions menu.

The Connections Add-in features are available as submenu on the email message More Actions menu. The menu actions shown will differ depending on whether you are in a reader view looking at received emails, or in a compose view creating a new email. Selecting any of the menu actions will show a sidebar with that feature.

In the reader view, ‘Upload’ and ‘Show Profiles’ menu actions are available in the HCL Connections submenu under the ‘More Actions’ menu. The ‘More Actions’ menu is available from the ‘…’ button at the top of the message:

![](data:image/jpeg;base64,)

Opening the More Actions menu will display the HCL Connections reader submenu:

![](data:image/jpeg;base64,)

In the compose view, ‘Add File’, ‘Upload File’, and ‘Add Recipients’ menu actions available in the HCL Connections submenu under the ‘More Actions’ menu. The ‘More Actions’ menu is available from the ‘…’ button at the bottom of the new message:

![](data:image/jpeg;base64,)

Opening the More Actions menu will display the HCL Connections compose submenu:

![](data:image/jpeg;base64,)

**Parent topic:**[Using the HCL Connections Add-in for Microsoft Outlook](../../connectors/enduser/c_ms_plugins_add_in_outlook.md)
